Name: 幻想异乡曲 Butterfly~Rin
About the game: 【Introduction to the game】 The game takes place in the mystic oriental land of Gensokyo, as usual. Today Reimu Hakurei also sat in her chair and enjoying the cherry blossoms with a cup of tea But Hakurei Dai-kekkai has a problem. So the Hakurei Reimu decided to solve the problem. Along with the investigation of the journey Things are getting more and more troublesome. Who is the blue figure? This is.....ihen... You are not deserve to be a Miko！！ You don't deserve to live hakurei shrine！ 「Master Spark」！！！！ ——————————————————————————- This is a second creation. Original works 「TouhouProject」 【GamePlay】 Game play for the traditional RPG game, the game contains exploration, puzzle solving, fighting And funny elements. 【Author's words】 After many difficulties,The game was finally completed smoothly. For more people to know TOHO I made this game. I hope you can enjoy this game. Welcome to join Tencent QQ group Welcome to chat, play games and make friends 《Exotic Gensokyo Butterfly~Rin》 Tencent QQ group：391305123
